alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 11:03PM EDT until July 02 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BUCKS COUNTY... At 1102 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Perkasie, or 16 miles southeast of Allentown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Perkasie, Doylestown, Bedminster, Chalfont, Tinicum, Dublin, Fricks, Ottsville, Pipersville, Telford, Sellersville, New Britain, Silverdale and Brittany Farms-Highlands. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
